    • grabCard

      public void grabCard(Player player, PlayingDeck playingDeck, int slot)
      Grabs a Card from the specified slot and Puts it in the Player's hand, then puts a Card from the top of the Deck of the PlayingDeck in the now empty slot. If the PlayingDeck is empty, puts in the slot a Card from the top of the other PlayingDeck
      Parameters:
      player - : the player who grabs the Card
      playingDeck - : the PlayingDeck associated to the Slots where the Player grabs the Card from
      slot - : an int value to identify the slot to grab the Card from.
